From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Megatron:





Megatron transformed to his beast mode and roared loudly as he walked to the 
main area of the cave. The sound echoed through every section of the cave 
that it could.

Pitiful Maximals. He couldn't stand their stupidity. Their ignorance.

Soon after, he heard the transmission from Koga. He stepped to the console, 
but it wasn't one he was used to. Perhaps a little too small.

He boomed into the air: "Dark Mouse!"
